title: Any one else Hyped for CHF

replies.body: Wooooo! Going to the finals! I'm super hyped :)
I mean... Chiefs are going to the finals! I wish I was too :(
kinda can, just fly to the thunder dome for the day of the finals then just go watch since your riot... consider urself helped also i know riot flys  u guys to the thunder dome if u gonna do that

Crazy hyped. SO CLOSE.

Got a tough bo5 ahead, but I think there is a good chance. Going to be nerve racking to watch tonight.
Today BKT, tommorow SKT. Love watching Cheifs play well vs other regions. They will get wrecked in worlds if they do make it, but they need to start playing tougher opponents.

This. A friend of mine was convinced that Chiefs would get crushed in Wildcard based on their OPL finals performance, but I knew they could do better than that if they played like they normally did. No doubt they'll get crushed in Worlds but I have a good feeling about this Bo5. Having an OCE team make worlds might convince some of people who trash talk OCE that we aren't such a bad region afterall. I mean, we'll never get to the level of the other regions, but maybe we can give them a run for their money.
I am super hyped!!!!! so awesome!!! and it looks like they will make it too!!!

Chiefs are going to be going to Worlds by the looks of it. The only teams they lost to didn't make it to the Wildcard Finals, and Chiefs were 2-0 in the Group Stage vs. the team they're versing in the Finals.
